MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut affecting the LL40 postcode area of Dolgellau, affecting properties in Islaw Dref and surrounding areas. It will be necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 12:45PM to make urgent repairs to overhead line equipment. Our team will be carrying out repair work safely on the overhead network and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible, and we expect the power to be restored by 3.45PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 11:30AM on 4th January 2021
